remarks: Equivalence used in the proof of ~ angpieqvd .  (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)
statement:
angpieqvdlem.A $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
angpieqvdlem.B $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
angpieqvdlem.C $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
angpieqvdlem.AneB $e |- ( ph -> A =/= B ) $.
angpieqvdlem.AneC $e |- ( ph -> A =/= C ) $.
angpieqvdlem $p |- ( ph -> ( -u ( ( C - B ) / ( A - B ) ) e. RR+ <-> ( ( C - B ) / ( C - A ) ) e. ( 0 (,) 1 ) ) ) $.
